biography: Joni is a formidable presence on the golf course, known for his strategic mind and unwavering focus. A true competitor, Joni hails from the esteemed Hill Side Golf Club, where he honed his skills and developed his passion for the game.

While Joni may be considered as retired from Hector events, his legacy is etched in the annals of the Hector Trophée. He has graced the tournament with his presence on one occasion, during which he demonstrated exceptional skill and determination, securing one victory for himself. Although he never managed to win the Victor Trophy, Joni's contributions to the sport remain significant.

Although Joni is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his fans and fellow competitors will undoubtedly remember his past achievements and the indelible mark he left on the tournament. It is always possible that there are last-minute changes to the field, and we would be thrilled to see Joni compete again.
